price: 96. Baye bazali kosangisa Allah na biloko bisusu, bakoyebaka kala te.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yajʿalūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fasawfa yaʿlamūna
